content.text: The code repository located at /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_min_20260129/jpmcli is currently written in Java 8. Please migrate the entire codebase to Java 17.

reasoningText.text:
I need to migrate a Java project from JDK 8 to JDK 17. Let me start by exploring the repository structure to understand what we're working with.

My approach will be:
1. First, explore the repository structure
2. Look at the pom.xml or build configuration files to see current Java version settings
3. Update the Java version to 17 in build files
4. Check for any code that needs to be updated for Java 17 compatibility
5. Run `mvn clean verify` to ensure everything works
6. Fix any issues that arise

Let's start!

<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
	xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
	<modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

	<groupId>biz.aQute.bnd</groupId>
	<artifactId>biz.aQute.jpm.run</artifactId>
	<description>Just Another Package Manager for Java</description>
	<name>${project.groupId}:${project.artifactId}</name>
	<version>${revision}</version>

	<properties>
		<revision>4.0.0-SNAPSHOT</revision>
		<project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
		<maven.compiler.target>1.8</maven.compiler.target>
		<maven.compiler.source>1.8</maven.compiler.source>

	<url>http://bndtools.org</url>

	</organization>
	<licenses>

			<url>http://www.opensource.org/licenses/apache2.0.php</url>
			<distribution>repo</distribution>
		</license>
	</licenses>
	<scm>
		<url>https://github.com/bndtools/jpmcli</url>
		<connection>scm:git:https://github.com/bndtools/jpmcli.git</connection>
		<developerConnection>scm:git:git@github.com:bndtools/jpmcli.git</developerConnection>
	</scm>
	<developers>
		<developer>
			<id>pkriens</id>
			<email>Peter.Kriens@aQute.biz</email>
		</developer>
		<developer>
			<id>gamerson</id>
			<email>gregory.amerson@liferay.com</email>
		</developer>
	</developers>

	<distributionManagement>
		<snapshotRepository>
			<id>ossrh</id>
			<url>https://oss.sonatype.org/content/repositories/snapshots</url>
		</snapshotRepository>
		<repository>
			<id>ossrh</id>
			<url>https://oss.sonatype.org/service/local/staging/deploy/maven2/</url>
		</repository>
	</distributionManagement>

	<repositories>
		<repository>
			<id>repo</id>
			<releases>
				<enabled>true</enabled>
				<checksumPolicy>ignore</checksumPolicy>
			</releases>
			<snapshots>
				<enabled>false</enabled>
			</snapshots>
			<url>file://${project.basedir}/repo</url>
		</repository>
	</repositories>

	<dependencies>
                <dependency>
                        <groupId>biz.aQute.bnd</groupId>
                        <artifactId>aQute.libg</artifactId>
                        <version>5.2.0</version>
                </dependency>
		<dependency>
			<groupId>biz.aQute.bnd</groupId>
			<artifactId>biz.aQute.bndlib</artifactId>
			<version>5.2.0</version>
		</dependency>
		<dependency>
			<groupId>biz.aQute.bnd</groupId>
			<artifactId>biz.aQute.repository</artifactId>
			<version>5.2.0</version>
		</dependency>
		<dependency>
			<groupId>junit</groupId>
			<artifactId>junit</artifactId>
			<version>4.13.1</version>
			<scope>test</scope>
		</dependency>
		<dependency>
			<groupId>org.boris.winrun4j</groupId>
			<artifactId>WinRun4J</artifactId>
			<version>0.4.5</version>
		</dependency>
		<dependency>
			<groupId>org.slf4j</groupId>
			<artifactId>slf4j-api</artifactId>
			<version>1.7.30</version>
		</dependency>
		<dependency>
			<groupId>org.slf4j</groupId>
			<artifactId>slf4j-simple</artifactId>
			<version>1.7.30</version>
		</dependency>
	</dependencies>

	<build>
		<plugins>
			<plugin>
				<groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
				<artifactId>maven-jar-plugin</artifactId>
				<version>2.6</version>
				<configuration>
					<archive>
						<manifestFile>${project.build.outputDirectory}/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF</manifestFile>
					</archive>
				</configuration>
			</plugin>
			<plugin>
				<groupId>biz.aQute.bnd</groupId>
				<artifactId>bnd-maven-plugin</artifactId>
				<version>5.2.0</version>
				<executions>
					<execution>
						<id>default-bnd-process</id>
						<goals>
							<goal>bnd-process</goal>
						</goals>
					</execution>
				</executions>
			</plugin>
			<plugin>
				<groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
				<artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
				<version>2.22.2</version>
				<configuration>
					<excludes>
						<exclude>**/ServiceTest.java</exclude>
					</excludes>
				</configuration>
			</plugin>
		</plugins>
	</build>
</project>

Excellent! The build succeeded. The warnings are about deprecated APIs (SecurityManager, Integer/Long constructors) but these are just warnings and don't prevent the build from succeeding. The code compiles and all tests pass with Java 17.

Let me verify the changes were applied correctly:

File content displayed in console.
Content: 
	<properties>
		<revision>4.0.0-SNAPSHOT</revision>
		<project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
		<maven.compiler.target>17</maven.compiler.target>

	</properties>
